About me

Hi. My name is Teodor and I am a Quality Assurance Automation Engineer at trivago. I am from Albania, but live in Dusseldorf, Germany. I graduated with a Bachelors degree from Jacobs University Bremen, majoring in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science.

Work

My daily routine is related to programming, mostly in Java and JavaScript, building Android applications on the side on my free time.
